creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: in foreground, a woman in kimono walks along riverbank at LR; a line of boats in the river in middle ground; blossoming trees; in background, a steep mountain with dense foliage
marks: left, cursive jizuri: 自摺　昭和八年作　櫻八題　嵐山 {jizuri, Shō LRC: よし田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Arashiyama
